meanings.definition: Hypergols: substances used in rocket propulsion that ignite spontaneously upon contact with each other.
meanings.sent1: The astronauts loaded the hypergols into the rocket before the launch.
meanings.sent2: The engineers carefully tested the hypergols before the mission.
meanings.sent3: The hypergols decided to have a race to see who could ignite faster.
meanings.sent4: The hypergols were like two friends who always sparked excitement when together.
meanings.sent5: The hypergols lit up the sky with their fiery energy.
